game.name: Cannibal Cuisine
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The god Hoochooboo is hungry… for you. But serving is better than being served in this co-op cook 'em up! Chop up vegetables, fruits and tourists and serve your divine delicacies in arcade style with up to 4 chefs!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The god Hoochooboo is hungry… for you. But serving is better than being served in this co-op cook 'em up! Chop up vegetables, fruits and tourists and serve your divine delicacies in arcade style with up to 4 chefs!

reviewHighlights.text: My partner and I have been searching for Overcooked alternatives for a while now. While Bronzebeard Tavern is a great alternative, its a completely di...
love this game. a bit hard. very sweaty
